text: Six Six Six Nights in Hell is the third album by Danish industrial band Psychopomps. The track "Wonderful World" was featured on the soundtrack to the movie Saw. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Jesper Schmidt: Vox, Programming, Keyboards Flemming Norre Larsen: Programming, Lyrics ==External links== * Psychopomps at myspace * Six Six Six Nights in Hell CD at Amazon.com Category:1995 albums Category:Psychopomps (band) albums
title: Six Six Six Nights in Hell
